title: For sale--50 raw t205's w/ sovereign backs -condition ranges from good to ex-mint

posts.post_title: For sale--50 raw t205's w/ sovereign backs -condition ranges from good to ex-mint
posts.post_content:
For those who missed my previous post, I have about 50 raw T205's .  All have

 sovereign backs and the conditions range from so-so to EX-MINT.


   Backs have toning, some with slight paper loss and are very fairly priced.

For spreadsheet , prices, scans etc, email please at [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]

thanks in advance Bill Latzko   770 873 1181

I've had a lot of great transactions with Bill. Great seller, and this is a good group of cards. I picked up a few Cubs I had been searching for. They were VERY fairly priced!

Thanks Bill.

Nate
Thanks billy, down right beautiful and the price was right!:d
